name: ItsGoinOn
tag_list: entertainment, social-media, mobile-application, social, social-network, venues, nightlife, demographics, real-time, discovery, profiles, music, comedy, bar, nightclub, lounge, music-venue
overview:
ItsGoinOn is an interactive Social Network service and Mobile Application connecting members and entertainment establishments with real time demographic data.

ItsGoinOn delivers â€œReal Time Social Hotspotâ€ data/statistics and venue information about local establishments to the end consumer. Primarily an online social network application, ItsGoinOn allows people to instantly connect to their desired cities real time entertainment information. Our database is populated by the establishmentsâ€™ use of ItsGoinOn’s MyDoorman Mobile Application.

ItsGoinOn members can now filter through venue types, gender ratios, age ranges, hotspots based on capacity, music genres, friends locations, and relationship status in addition to receiving suggested establishments based on their personal entertainment trends. Facebook integration allows our members to share those entertainment trends with friends.

ItsGoinOn allows members/businesses real time interaction with the network via their smart phone. i.e. iPhone, Blackberry, Android.

ItsGoinOn was founded by Patrick Gorman, Brandon Williams, and Eric Johnson.

milestones.description: Announced Mark Edward Roberts on Board of Directors
Announced John Duffield as Strategic Advisor
Announced Jeff Weiland as Director of Sales
Announced Wayne Packard as Mobile Application Developer
